creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Stephen M. Goudy
description: image of a barefooted man wearing shorts and short-sleeved shirt, standing in profile, reflected in mirror on a stand at right; work table and bookcase to left of mirror; open patio door with foliage outdoors
inscription: on back in pencil: Selenium Toned Gelatin Silver Print / for Steve & Linda Goudy / Gretefully, / D.T.
markings: on back in pencil and stamped in black: FILE NUMBER A84H3 / IDENTIFICATION / 16 (circled) 2 Feb 85 / DAVID J. TEPLICA
signed: on back in pencil: Paul Cadmus at Eighty. / Artists\' Proof / Teplica / © David Teplica
title: Paul Cadmus at 80
